text: Masuccio Primo (or Masuccio I) (1230–1306) was an Italian architect and sculptor of the 13th century, active in Naples. He was the godfather of the son of Pietro degli Stefani, known as Masuccio Segondo (1291–1387). ==References== * Category:Architects from Naples Category:13th-century Italian architects Category:13th-century Italian sculptors Category:Italian male sculptors Category:14th-century Italian sculptors Category:1230 births Category:1306 deaths
title: Masuccio Primo
